tool_description: The Similarweb API offers access to comprehensive web analytics and online market intelligence, providing valuable insights into websites, mobile apps, top rankings, and market shares. Gain deep understanding and strategic advantage with powerful data-driven insights into digital landscapes and consumer behavior trends.
name: Similarweb Data
title: Similarweb Data

api_list.name: top apps

required_parameters.name: store
required_parameters.description:
Store parameter.

apple: App Store
google: Google Play Store

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description:
You should utilize the Filter Options endpoint (with type=apps) to display the categories available for selection, excluding the parameter for All categories.

Example: productivity

optional_parameters.name: device
optional_parameters.description: Currently available for the App Store

optional_parameters.name: subcategory
optional_parameters.description:
You should use the Filter Options endpoint (with type=apps) to list the sub-categories that can be selected. Don't send the parameter for All categories.

Example: action

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description:
You should employ the Filter Options endpoint (with type=apps) to showcase the countries available for selection, excluding the parameter for Worldwide.

Example: australia

api_list.name: app analytics / google play
app analytics / app store
top websites
website analytics / light & fast
website analytics / detailed
marketshare

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description:
It must be one of the following:

browsers
search-engines
platforms

api_list.name: filter options

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description:
Default: websites. It must be one of the following:

websites
apps
browsers
search-engines
platforms

api_list.name: autocomplete
